PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-08502015-06-18,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Prescribing Public Officers
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING PUBLIC OFFICERS in order to maintain the legal exemption that allows parliamentary security personnel to possess, carry and transport firearms in the course of their employment duties, in view of the change of employer.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0166 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
